Class NotificationBroadcaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.optimizely.ab.notification.NotificationBroadcaster
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class NotificationBroadcaster
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages Optimizely SDK notification listeners and broadcasts messages.

      • broadcastEventTracked

        public void broadcastEventTracked(@Nonnull
                                  java.lang.String eventKey,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  java.lang.String userId,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes,
                                  @CheckForNull
                                  java.lang.Long eventValue,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  LogEvent logEvent)
        Deprecated. 
        Notify listeners that an Optimizely event has been tracked.
        Parameters:
        eventKey - the key of the tracked event
        userId - the ID of the user
        attributes - a map of attributes about the event
        eventValue - an integer to be aggregated for the event
        logEvent - the log event sent to the event dispatcher

      • broadcastExperimentActivated

                                         java.lang.String userId,

                                         @Nonnull
                                         Variation variation)
        Deprecated. 
        Notify listeners that an Optimizely experiment has been activated.
        Parameters:
        experiment - the key of the activated experiment
        userId - the id of the user
        attributes - a map of attributes about the user
        variation - the key of the variation that was bucketed
